text: 24:7 2 Eghaghaniba 15:6; Aisaia 19:2; Hagai 2:22; Sekaraia 14:13; Aposel 11:28Kantrin mamɨn itir darazi dɨkavigh kantrin igharazimɨn itir darazi ko mɨsogham. Eghtɨ atrivir mamɨn adarazi dɨkavigh atrivir igharazimɨn adarazi ko mɨsogham. Danganir mabar dagheba bar puvaratɨghtɨma, gumazamiziba mɨtiriamra ikiam. Eghtɨ mɨkɨmkɨziba uaghan otivam.
